q: . In practice, Andy Coulson made up his mind before Christmas that he would have to go.`` Andy Coulson was running at 70 per cent of his capacity- at best,'' says one ally. He wasn't prepared to work on that basis. David Cameron and George Osborne tried hard to dissuade him from stepping down. Indeed, it is a measure of how much they valued him that they were prepared to put up with the drip-drip of stories about alleged telephone hacking
